General.Name: Varia US Properties Ltd
General.Description: Varia US Properties AG, a real estate investment company, acquires, holds, and sells properties in the United States. The company invests in low-moderate income and workforce multifamily housing properties. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Zug, Switzerland.
